Greetings to all,

I have just added some tosogu to the web site.  The new additions include a futatokoro-mono of cloud dragons,  mitsu tomoe mon kogai,  Tokubetsu Kicho Choshu tsuba and a eda botan Choshu tsuba.  Please take a look if you have any interest.  

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_home.html

Happy Holidays !
